select a.WOT_ID,a.USER_ID,b.USER_NAME as USER_ID_NAME,a.WOT_DATE,a.WOT_PARTICIPANT,a.WOT_PLACE,a.WOT_DESC,a.WOT_TIME,a.WOT_APPROVER,c.USER_NAME as WOT_APPROVER_NAME, a.WOT_APP_TIME,a.APP_RESULT,a.WOT_APP_OPINION,a.WOT_OVERTIME_DATE,a.STATE from hr_work_overtime a join security_user b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join security_user c on a.WOT_APPROVER=c.USER_ID where 1=1
and WOT_OVERTIME_DATE >= #sdate#
and WOT_OVERTIME_DATE <= #edate#
and b.USER_ID = #currentUserId#
and b.USER_NAME = #user_Name#
and STATE = #STATE#
order by WOT_OVERTIME_DATE,b.USER_CODE

select a.WOT_ID,a.USER_ID,b.USER_NAME as USER_ID_NAME,a.WOT_DATE,a.WOT_PARTICIPANT,a.WOT_PLACE,a.WOT_DESC,a.WOT_TIME,a.WOT_APPROVER,c.USER_NAME as WOT_APPROVER_NAME,a.WOT_APP_TIME,a.APP_RESULT,a.WOT_APP_OPINION,a.WOT_OVERTIME_DATE,a.STATE from hr_work_overtime a join security_user b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join security_user c on a.WOT_APPROVER=c.USER_ID where 1=1
WOT_DATE=#currentDate#
WOT_ID=#WOT_ID#
